short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Compares what is in your cart with other e-commerce sites to find the cheapest alternatives

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BuyBook - Smart Shopping Assistant

Overview
BuyBook is your intelligent shopping companion that automatically finds cheaper alternatives for items in your cart across 100+ South African retailers. Stop overpaying for the same products - let BuyBook do the price comparison work for you in real-time.

Key Features

üîç Smart Price Comparison
- Real-time price tracking across multiple retailers
- Instant alternative product suggestions
- Automated best deal finder
- Same products, same quality, better prices

üõçÔ∏è Retailer Network
- Integration with 100+ South African online stores
- Comprehensive coverage of major e-commerce platforms
- Real-time inventory checking
- Trusted retailer verification

‚ö° Seamless Shopping Experience
- One-click price comparison
- Works automatically while you browse
- Non-intrusive design
- Smart cart analysis
- Instant price alerts

üîí Privacy & Security
- Secure and privacy-focused design
- No personal data storage
- Encrypted communication
- Transparent data practices
- Compliant with privacy regulations

Data Collection
The extension collects minimal required data to function:
- Cart content information (product names, prices, quantities)
- Shopping preferences and history
- Search queries within the extension
- Basic browser information for compatibility

User Controls
Manage your experience through:
- Customizable price alert thresholds
- Retailer preferences
- Search history management
- Privacy settings
- Account preferences

Support
We're here to help:
- Email Support: luvo@buybook.co.za
- WhatsApp Support: +27 71 245 3539
- Quick response times:
  - Email: Within 24 hours
  - WhatsApp: Within 2 hours

How to Get Started
1. Install the extension
2. Create your free account
3. Start shopping
4. Let BuyBook find better deals automatically

---

Transform your online shopping experience with BuyBook - your intelligent shopping assistant that ensures you never overpay again. Same products, same quality, better prices.
